snippet.title: Clive 'N' Wrench - Release Date Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Finally, after nearly 12 years of work IT IS TIME (and space)!!

Check out the full gameplay trailer with all the NEW platforms: https://youtu.be/DDPKVSXCsGU

Pre-order the game: https://bit.ly/CliveNG
Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/CliveSteam


Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/rurDFWv
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ClassicGJ
Keep up to date: www.CliveNWrench.com
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CliveGame
